trigger.match: ^With a quick spin\, ([A-Z][a-z]+) strikes your (head|chest|gut|left arm|left leg|right arm|right leg) with (.+?)\.$
trigger.name: tahtetso_tahto__

trigger.match: ^.+? grinds into your jaw\, crushing the bones\.$
trigger.name: tahtetso_rakto_head__

trigger.match: ^.+? grinds into your (left|right) (arm|leg)\, crushing the bones\.$
trigger.name: tahtetso_rakto_limb__

trigger.match: ^.+? grinds into your gut\, tearing through your nerve cent(?:er|re)s\.$
trigger.name: tahtetso_rakto_gut__

trigger.match: ^You draw breath in short\, rasping gasps from the pain in your chest\.$
trigger.name: tahtetso_raktiini_chest__

trigger.match: ^Your gut is hit with a loud crack\, causing you to double over as the wind is knocked out of you\.$
trigger.name: tahtetso_raktiini_gut__

trigger.match: ^Your (left|right) leg is hit with a loud crack\, breaking your kneecap and causing your leg to twist unnaturally\.$
trigger.name: tahtetso_raktiini_leg__

trigger.match: ^With a quick snap of the wrist\, ([A-Z][a-z]+) swings (.+?) about\, slamming one end into your (left|right) arm\. The limb buckles with an audible\, horrible crack as a sharp pain shoots along its length\.$
trigger.name: tahtetso_bomrakini_arm__

trigger.match: ^With a quick snap of the wrist\, ([A-Z][a-z]+) swings (.+?) about\, slamming one end into your (left|right) leg\. Searing lancets of pain jolt up your leg as your foot is pulverised beneath the weapon\.$
trigger.name: tahtetso_bomrakini_leg__

trigger.match: ^You scream as ([A-Z][a-z]+) applies pressure with .+?(?:\, dislocating your (head|chest|gut|left arm|left leg|right arm|right leg) with a loud snap)?\.$
trigger.name: tahtetso_bomrakobo__

trigger.match: ^Stepping behind you\, ([A-Z][a-z]+) locks your head with (.+?)\, choking you\.$
trigger.name: tahtetso_bairak__

trigger.match: ^You lose consciousness as ([A-Z][a-z]+) continues to choke you with [hH](?:is|er) tahto staff\.$
trigger.name: tahtetso_bairak_choking__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) swings [hH](?:is|er) leg high into the air at your (head|chest)(\, sending you reeling)?\.$
trigger.name: tahtetso_starkick__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) sweeps .+? in a low\, wide circle\, attempting to trip [hH](?:is|er) foes\.$
trigger.name: tahtetso_tidesweep__

trigger.match: ^You are hit by the sweep and topple to the ground\.$
trigger.name: tahtetso_tideswept__

trigger.match: ^You\'re thrown off balance and fall down from the whirling strike\.$
trigger.name: tahtetso_bomolini__

trigger.match: ^With a swift drive\, ([A-Z][a-z]+) jabs your head with (.+?)\.$
trigger.name: tahtetso_bairakobo__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) sweeps (.+?) into your (head|chest|gut|left arm|left leg|right arm|right leg) with a loud crack\, causing the staff to vibrate\.
trigger.name: tahtetso_tahtosho__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) steps forward with one foot and simultaneously slams (.+?) into your (left|right) arm\. You gasp in agony as your fingers loosen their grip on (.+?)\.$
trigger.name: tahtetso_raktisho_arm__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) steps forward with one foot and simultaneously slams (.+?) into your chest\. You (are dimly aware of your ribs splintering in dozens of places as you fall backwards to the ground|stumble backwards\, trying to stay standing while your ribs feel as though they\'ve splintered into a hundred pieces)\.$
trigger.name: tahtetso_raktisho_chest__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) steps forward with one foot and simultaneously slams (.+?) into your (left|right) leg\. Your vision spins\, capturing all that is above you in a fleeting glimpse before it is consumed by the ground\.$
trigger.name: tahtetso_raktisho_leg__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) steps forward with one foot and simultaneously slams (.+?) into your head\, sending a thick fog over your consciousness\.$
trigger.name: tahtetso_raktisho_head__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) steps forward with one foot and simultaneously slams (.+?) into your gut\. You stumble backwards\, your head ringing painfully\.$
trigger.name: tahtetso_raktisho_gut__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) cracks (.+?) precisely into your (left|right) leg\, causing spasms to numb your stiffening muscles\.$
trigger.name: tahtetso_bomolsho__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) twists .+? painfully as it strikes\.$
trigger.name: tahtetso_twist__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) cracks (.+?) precisely into your (left|right) arm\, causing spasms to numb your stiffening side\.$
trigger.name: tahtetso_bomirrak__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) swings (.+?) in a circle before smashing one end into the side of your gut\, echoing a sickening crack as you lose all control over your body\.$
trigger.name: tahtetso_raktiahsho_gut__

trigger.match: ^With a quick spin\, ([A-Z][a-z]+) strikes your head with (.+?)\,? and the world around you spins\.$
trigger.name: tahtetso_raktiahsho_head__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) swings (.+?) in a circle before smashing one end into the side of your (left|right) (arm|leg)\. You can only look away\, the distant pain telling you the limb has been mangled beyond use\.$
trigger.name: tahtetso_raktiahsho_limb1__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) swings (.+?) in a circle before bringing it through your (left|right) (arm|leg)\. A horrific pain washes over you as (?:the bone snaps|(?:[hH]|[sS]h)e sweeps you off the ground\, the limb flailing in the air at an unnatural angle)\.$
trigger.name: tahtetso_raktiahsho_limb2__

trigger.match: ^Your lungs fill with fluid as ([A-Z][a-z]+) swings (.+?) in a circle before smashing one end into the side of your chest\, knocking the air from your lungs\. You gasp\, but only blood takes its place\.$
trigger.name: tahtetso_raktiahsho_chest__

trigger.match: ^Swept low by (.+?)\, you howl in agony as ([A-Z][a-z]+)(?: deftly)? strikes your (left|right) leg(?: and shatters your ankle)?\.$
trigger.name: tahtetso_bomolahsho__

trigger.match: ^You gasp and clutch your chest as it is struck with a crack\.$
trigger.name: tahtetso_gahtiahsho__

trigger.match: ^Swinging (.+?)\, ([A-Z][a-z]+) bumps your (head|chest|gut|left arm|left leg|right arm|right leg) to little effect\.$
trigger.name: tahtetso_gahtiraksho_fail__
